page.title: 10FEELINGS : CRANTOCK/PENTIRE
page.content: {Unemployment}Many local people don't like the 'visitors' who come from up country for a holiday instead of looking for work. {Traffic}A number of people think that there should be a multi-storey car park because there is not enough car parking space in the holiday seasons. {Gannel Link Road} The residents of Pentire do not like the idea because it will spoil the beauty of the river and cause tidal problems. {Stealing}The public in the Crantock area think stealing is on the increase, especially petty theft. { {Vandalism} People feel this is a big problem as posts and signs are torn up for barbecues, toilets are spray painted and paths made where they shouldn't be. {Dogs}A lot of locals are concerned about the health hazard caused by dogs fouling our beaches.
